Initiatives already taken by CBSL
CBSL  has  taken  multiple  steps  to  facilitate  FinTech  as 
well as to address the key risks. Some of these initiatives 
are detailed below:
Regulatory 
management and resilience 
The CBSL in 2021 introduced regulatory framework on 
technology risk management and resilience as a set of 
minimum regulatory requirements for licensed banks. The 
key characteristics of the framework are the introduction 
of  enhanced  information  security,  system  availability, 
and 
resilience 
systems, enhanced information security requirements for 
sensitive  data,  and  higher  risk  management  measures
